items: Pray The Father's Prayer (Matthew 6:9–13) Three Times A Day, As Daniel Did (Daniel 6:10).
Keep The Holy Days Through Sacred Gatherings — Holy Convocations (Leviticus 23:4).

items.title: Honor The Shabbat (Exodus 35:2)
subitems: Do No Work, Including Cooking Or Physical Exercise.
Do Not Buy Or Sell (Nehemiah 10:31; Amos 8:5).
No Sexual Activity On The Sabbath.

items: Observe The Feast Days (Leviticus 23:37) With Reverence And Joy.
Be Circumcised — Sons On The 8th Day, Or Later When They Can Choose (Genesis 17:9–13).
Do Not Shave Bald Or Shape Your Hairline (Leviticus 21:5).
Wear Fringes On The Borders Of Your Garments As A Reminder Of The Covenant (Numbers 15:38–39).
Wear Feminine Clothing; Do Not Wear Men’s Apparel — And Vice Versa For Men (Deuteronomy 22:5).
During Menstruation, Do Not Be Touched (Leviticus 15:19).
After Childbirth, A Woman Is Considered Ceremonially Unclean — Make Atonement As Prescribed (Leviticus 12).

items.title: Eat Only Clean Animals (Leviticus 11)
subitems: No Seafood Without Fins And Scales (Leviticus 11:9–10).

items: Love Your Neighbor As Yourself (1 Corinthians 13:4–7).
Walk In Humility And Meekness — You Shall Inherit The Earth (Philippians 2:3–4; Matthew 5:5).
